features.name: Rage
features.description: While raging, you gain advantages on Strength checks and saving throws.

features.name: Unarmored Defense
features.description: While not wearing armor, your AC equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier.

items.name: Greatsword
items.description: A large two-handed sword, perfect for devastating attacks.

items.name: Ring of Protection
items.description: Grants a +1 bonus to AC and saving throws while wearing this ring.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: A bright streak flashes from your pointing finger to a point you choose within range, creating an explosion of fire.

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.description: A magical force surrounds you, granting an AC of 13 + your Dexterity modifier.
